title: The First Website
description: The world's first website, created by Tim Berners-Lee in 1991, was a simple HTML page.

title: Mobile Dominance
description: Mobile browsing now surpasses desktop usage, making mobile optimization essential for web success.

title: Need for Speed
description: One-second delays in page load time can lead to 7% fewer conversions. Prioritize fast-loading websites for better user experiences and SEO rankings.
